import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import EditActions from "../../components/EditActions"; import "./index.scss"; import Profile from "../../assets/images/profile.jpg"; const EditPage = () => { const { auth } = useSelector((state) => state); const initialState = { fullname: "", username: "", mobile: "", address: "", website: "", story: "", gender: "", }; const [userData, setUserData] = useState(initialState); const { fullname, username, mobile, address, website, story, gender } = userData; const [avatar, setAvatar] = useState(""); const changeAvatar = (e) => {}; const handleInput = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setUserData({ ...userData, [name]: value }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); }; return ( <>

); }; export default EditPage;
